text:
In the depths of the [[Towering Wood]], splendor and beauty surrenders to the darkness known as the Gloaming. Here, malformed trees are hosts to parasites, [[disease]], and swarms of horrid insects. Monstrous beetles, spiders, and centipedes
attack unwary travelers. The [[druid]]s believe that this region marks the location of a massive [[manifest zone]] to the [[plane]] of [[Mabar]].

The [[Children of Winter]] often dwell among the twisted trees here, meditating on the cycle of life and death. Because [[Mabar]] brings only death and decay, the Children use their [[druidic magic|primal magic]] to contain the influence of the Gloaming and prevent it from throwing off the balance of nature.
title: Gloaming
tooltip: region of darkness in the Towering Wood, tended by the Children of Winter
